0.0.1.name: wordpress/taxography
0.0.1.description:
Perhaps you want to use category image? This plugin gives you total control over the output of your taxonomies. Displays a list of selected taxonomy as links with thumbnail and it's short description. This plugin comes with several options as a post/page content or as a widget with similiar functionality. Support multiwidget easy to customize and full features. Displays a list of categories as links. When a list item link is clicked, all the posts in that taxonomy will display on your category, tag, archieve or taxonomy page using the appropriate category template dictated by the template hierarchy rules. This plugin is based on the WordPress function wp_list_categories()

Key Features & Options

  • Beautiful backend interface
  • Description, show or hide the category item description.
  • Display as a list or inline.
  • Order by as
